====================

### Project Title: Cleaning Services for the Embassy of Canada to Haiti

#### Project Overview

The Government of Canada is seeking a contractor to provide comprehensive cleaning and janitorial services for the Embassy of Canada in Port-au-Prince, Haiti. The successful bidder will be responsible for maintaining a clean and healthy work environment for approximately 180 occupants, adhering to industry standards and best practices.

#### Key Highlights

- **Tender Reference:** PW-22-01014861
- **Solicitation Number:** 22-195414-B
- **Tender Closing Date:** December 28, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
- **Contract Category:** Service (SRV)
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding

#### Contract Requirements

The contractor will be expected to provide a range of cleaning and janitorial services, including:

*   Cleaning services for all offices, public and utility spaces, recreational facilities, lobbies at the Chancery, and other Mission premises
*   Provision of labor, supervision, cleaning materials, supplies, uniforms, cleaning tools, and equipment
*   Maintenance of a clean and healthy work environment for approximately 180 occupants

#### Eligibility Criteria

Bidders must be in compliance with all relevant government procurement policies and procedures, including the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
